channel.title: Your favorite lyrics
channel.description:
What are your favorite lyrics? To any song, post lyrics of songs not, every lyric to the song. Avenged Sevenfold - Fiction
Left this life to set me free Took a piece of you inside of me. Now this hurt can finally fade Promise me you'll never be afraid.
That whole album is very meaningful, but i would have to say that fiction is one of my favorite songs on the album.

item.title: Your favorite lyrics
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

In sams town by the killers

so why do you waste my time, is the answer to the question on your mind

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite lyrics
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Tupac - Me against the world

With all this extra stressin The question I wonder is after death, after my last breath When will I finaly get to rest? Through this supression they punish the people that's askin questions And those that possess, steal from the ones without possesions The message I stress: to make it stop study your lessons Don't settle for less - even the genius asks-es questions Be grateful for blessings Don't ever change, keep your essence The power is in the people and politics we address Always do your best, don't let the pressure make you panic And when you get stranded And things don't go the way you planned it Dreamin of riches, in a position of makin a difference Politicians and hypocrites, they don't wanna listen If I'm insane, it's the fame made a brother change It wasn't nuttin like the game It's just me against the world

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite lyrics
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Success is my only motherfucking option, failure's not Mom, I love you, but this trailer's got to go I cannot grow old in Salem's lot So here I go is my shot. Feet fail me not cause maybe the only opportunity that I got

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite lyrics
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

For a sec I even gave up believing and praying I even done the legal stuff and was leaded astray Now money is the root to the evilist ways But have you ever been so hungry that it keeps you awake Mate, now my hunger would leave them amazed Great, it feels like a long time coming, fam Since the day I thought of that cunning plan One day I had a dream I tried to chase it But I wasn’t going nowhere, running man! I knew that maybe someday I would understand Trying to turn a tenner to a hundred grand Everyones a kid that no-one cares about You just have to keep screaming until they hear you out

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite lyrics
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Us, and Them. And after all we're only ordinary men. Me, and you. God only knows it's not what we would choose, to do. Forward he cried, from the rear, and the front rank died. And the General sat, as the lines on the map, moved from side to side

item.description:

Avenged sevenfold - Gunslinger

I reach towards the sky I've said my goodbyes My heart's always with you now I won't question why so many have died My prayers have made it through yeah 'Cause with all these things we do It don't matter when I'm coming home to you

item.title: Your favorite lyrics
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

What are your favorite lyrics? To any song, post lyrics of songs not, every lyric to the song.

Avenged Sevenfold - Fiction

Left this life to set me free Took a piece of you inside of me. Now this hurt can finally fade Promise me you'll never be afraid.

That whole album is very meaningful, but i would have to say that fiction is one of my favorite songs on the album.
